isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, FENDERS AND BUMPER - 8500 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - FENDERS

svcprocinfo.para: The 8500 Series fender assemblies are comprised of multiple components: the air intake frame, the upper fender section, the wheel well opening "valance", headlights, clearance lights and lower hood latch. To remove the valance and headlight assemblies, the grille and shroud should be removed first.

svcsubproc.title: Fender Lower Section Removal
svcsubproc.para: The fender upper section is bonded to the hood assembly. The lower fender section or "valance" encapsulates the headlight housing and wheel well. The valance is a separate assembly and can be removed. The air inlet frame is an integral part of the upper fender section which is bonded component of the hood assembly. The upper fender section is removed with the hood assembly.

step1.para: Tilt the hood to the forward open position.
Disconnect the chassis harness ( Item 3, Figure 12) to the headlight assembly and the connection between the clearance light and headlight harness.

Locate the valance mounting points and screws ( Item 2, Figure 26) along the fender flange, and headlight assembly attachment screws attaching the headlight assembly mounting holes in the valance assembly ( Item 3, Figure 27).
Remove the (2) headlight assembly mounting screws located along the lower edge of the valance.
Remove the valance mounting screws located in the mounting holes ( Item 2, Figure 26) along the inside flange between the fender flange and the valance flange assembly.
Follow the same procedure for the opposite side valance removal.
Beginning with the valance assembly, locate the mounting holes in the fender flange. Align the valance assembly mounting holes ( Item 2, Figure 26) in position with the holes in the fender flange.
Insert the screws and tighten.
Align the valance and headlight assembly lower mounting holes and insert the mounting screws into the valance and headlight assembly.
Tighten the two mounting screws to 46 - 51 Nm (34 - 38 lbf-ft).

svcsubproc.title: Headlight Removal
svcsubproc.para: To remove the headlight assembly refer to the procedure for removing and installing the grille and shroud. The grille and shroud must be removed prior to removing the headlight assembly.

step1.para: Tilt the hood assembly forward, disconnect the headlight and clearance light harness ( Item 3, Figure 12).
Loosen and remove the two (2) headlight assembly mounting nuts from the headlight assembly mounting studs ( Item 4, Figure 41) on the rear of the headlight housing.
Tilt hood to original position. Loosen and remove the headlight assembly mounting bolt ( Item 5, Figure 27) from the fender assembly mounting hole ( Item 7, Figure 27).
Remove headlight assembly.
To remove the opposite side headlight assembly follow the procedures as listed above.

specpara.para: Headlight adjustment is addressed in ADJUSTMENTS section.

svcsubproc.title: Headlight Install
svcsubproc.para: The grille and shroud assembly should have been previously removed.
Refer to Figure 27 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Insert the headlight assembly ( Item 4) into the headlight housing opening ( Item 10), aligning the mounting studs ( Item 7) with the mounting holes in the headlight housing ( Item 3) .
Insert the headlight assembly mounting bolt ( Item 5) into the headlight mounting tab and headlight assembly bolt hole ( Item 8).
Tilt the hood forward.
Install the headlight assembly mounting nuts on the mounting studs ( Item 2, Figure 42) located on the rear of the headlight housing. Tighten nuts to 14 - 18 Nm (10 - 13 lbf-ft).
Insert the lower headlight assembly mounting screws through mounting holes in the valance assembly and tighten.
Reconnect the clearance light harness into the headlight harness. Plug the headlight harness into the chassis harness located above the frame rail section at the radiator mounting block.
Tilt the hood back and secure the hood latches.
Re-install shroud and grille assembly.

svcsubproc.title: Clearance Light Removal
svcsubproc.para: The clearance light is located at the rear of the fender hood section above the hood latching mechanism.

step1.para: Tilt the hood forward.
Locate the clearance light assembly plug.
Twist bulb assembly and remove socket from clearance light assembly.
Loosen and remove Phillips head screw on outboard side of housing.
Loosen and remove torque head screw at back section of housing.
Remove clearance light assembly.
Follow same procedure for removal of opposite side clearance light.

figure.caption: Figure 28. Clearance Lights - Driver Side Shown

svcsubproc.title: Clearance Light Install
svcsubproc.para: With hood tilted insert the clearance light assembly into the clearance light housing at rear of fender section.

step1.para: Align and insert torque head screw forward mounting hole in clearance light housing.
Insert Phillips head screw in outboard mounting hole and tighten.
Place bulb and socket assembly in clearance light assembly and twist to lock.
Plug clearance light harness ( Item 3, Figure 12) into headlight assembly harness.

figure.caption: Figure 30. Headlight-Clearance Light Harness Connections (Driver Side Shown)

svcsubproc.title: Hood Latch Upper Remove
svcsubproc.para: The hood latching mechanism consists of two assemblies: the upper hood / fender assembly latch and the lower fender extension lock.

figure.caption: Figure 31. Upper Hood / Fender Latch Attachment -Passenger Side Shown

svcsubproc.para: The upper hood/fender latch attachment assembly is located at the rear section of the fender assembly ( Item 3, Figure 31). The assembly swings down, latches on the lower catch assembly and secures the hood in position. To remove the latch assembly:

step1.para: Release the latching mechanism both sides of the hood and tilt hood forward.
Loosen and remove the hood latch mounting bolts, lock washers and latch on the fender assembly.
Follow same procedure for removal of opposite side.

svcsubproc.title: Upper Hood Latch Install
svcsubproc.para: Release the latching mechanism both sides of hood and tilt hood forward.

step1.para: Position the upper latching mechanism and align the mounting holes of the latch assembly with the mounting holes in the fender assembly.
Insert the mounting bolts and lock washers and tighten to 46 - 51 Nm (34 - 38 lbf-ft).
Lower hood and latch both sides of the hood.
Follow same procedure for installation on opposite side.
